fooman_surcharge_all.comment: For detailed instructions please refer to the Surcharge User Manual here.

surchargeon.label: Calculate Surcharge On
surchargeon.tooltip:
Choose how your surcharges will be calculated. These settings apply to all surcharges.

Control-click to select multiple variables on which you would like the surcharge or discount to be calculated on:
• Subtotal: The order subtotal, excluding tax or shipping
• Shipping: The total shipping cost, excluding any shipping tax
• Subtotal Incl. Tax: The order subtotal, including tax but excluding shipping
• Shipping Incl. Tax: The total shipping cost, including any shipping tax
• Tax: The total tax amount on the order and shipping
• Exclude discount: Exclude any discount from the calculation
• Grand Total: The grand total (this option overrides all options above and cannot be selected together with these variables)

titleadjust.label: Display Surcharge in Payment Information Step
titleadjust.tooltip: When set to 'Yes', this setting will adjust the title of the payment method during checkout to indicate how much using the payment method would add to the order. Surcharge amounts will be calculated automatically.

titleformat.label: Surcharge Display Format
titleformat.tooltip:
You can enter free text and use the following {} commands:
{TITLE} enters the payment method title
{AMOUNT} enters the surcharge amount (calculated automatically based on the payment method and order amount)
{DESCRIPTION} enters the surcharge description that you set yourself in the below sections.

enabled.label: Enable Store Code Fee
enabled.tooltip: When set to Yes, a Store Code fee will be enabled.

handlingtype.label: Payment Surcharge Type
handlingtype.tooltip:
Choose your preferred calculation model:
• Fixed: The amount in the Fixed Store Point field
• Percent: The percentage in Store Point

description.label: Surcharge Description
description.tooltip: Enter the surcharge description that will be visible to the customer eg. 'Surcharge for orders outside the EU'.

applygroupfilter.label: Apply Group Filter
applygroupfilter.tooltip: When set to Yes, you can choose to apply the surcharge only to particular customer groups. When set to No, the surcharge will be applied to all customer groups.

group.label: Only for Customer Groups
group.tooltip: If you have set Apply Group Filter (above) to Yes, use this setting to choose which customer groups the surcharge will apply to. Control-click to select as many customer types you wish to apply the surcharge to.

fooman_surcharge.label: Fooman Surcharge
fooman_surcharge.tooltip: Option to change where the surcharge shows in the checkout totals sort order

surcharge_tax_class.label: Tax Class For Surcharge
surcharge_tax_class.tooltip:
Choose which tax class you want to apply to surcharges (if any):
• Dominant tax rate (this will tally up all existing tax rates of products in the basket, and assign the dominant tax rate to the surcharge)
• The other options will populate automatically using the tax rates you have configured on your Magento store

tax_included_in_surcharge.label: Surcharge Prices
tax_included_in_surcharge.tooltip:
Set whether the surcharge amounts entered during set up should include or exclude tax. This setting only has effect when Tax Class for Surcharge (above) is applied.

Example 1: 'Fixed Transaction Cost' surcharge of $10 and tax rate of 10%:

• Including tax: Surcharge = $9.09, surcharge tax = $0.91, giving a total of $10
• Excluding tax: Surcharge = $10, surcharge tax = $1, giving a total of $11

Example 2: 'Payment Surcharge %' of 2.5% on a purchase amount of $100, with a tax rate of 10%:

• Including tax: Surcharge = $2.27, surcharge tax = $0.23, giving a total of $2.50
• Excluding tax: Surcharge = $2.50, surcharge tax = $0.25, giving a total of $2.75
